channel.title: Lightsin's Titanfall Jungle of Bullshit (1/5) Canned cuz no interest
channel.description:
# Jungle of Bullshit- Lightsin's Titanfall Edition
## Laws
* Nu angleshooting *(shouldn't be an issue, but I'll slap the shit out of someone with my modkill hammer if it does).* * game starts when it fills. * Days are 15 mins at most, there is no night phase; a lynch just moves the day onward. * Just have common sense. * Max players are 5, as I don't know how to exactly increase player capacity without really screwing up the entire system.
### Gameplay
* If a townie is lynched Day 1, they do not die and must instead immediately kill two other players. *Note: if a townie is attacked by the day vig, then they die.* * If a mafia member is lynched day 1, they must immediately confirm one of the town players as town and then kill one of their buddies. * Town win when all mafia are dead. Mafia win if a town player is lynched on Day 2. * The Setup is a simple 3 mafia and 2 town.
### To Join To join, you can just say **/slide into here**, or **/join**, or anything related to the pair.
## Players:
1. 2. Luna 3. 4. 5.

item.title: Lightsin's Titanfall Jungle of Bullshit (1/5) Canned cuz no interest
item.dc:creator: Lightsin
item.description:
Jungle of Bullshit- Lightsin’s Titanfall Edition

Laws

  • Nu angleshooting (shouldn’t be an issue, but I’ll slap the shit out of someone with my modkill hammer if it does).
  • game starts when it fills.
  • Days are 15 mins at most, there is no night phase; a lynch just moves the day onward.
  • Just have common sense.
  • Max players are 5, as I don’t know how to exactly increase player capacity without really screwing up the entire system.

Gameplay

  • If a townie is lynched Day 1, they do not die and must instead immediately kill two other players. Note: if a townie is attacked by the day vig, then they die.
  • If a mafia member is lynched day 1, they must immediately confirm one of the town players as town and then kill one of their buddies.
  • Town win when all mafia are dead. Mafia win if a town player is lynched on Day 2.
  • The Setup is a simple 3 mafia and 2 town.

To Join

To join, you can just say /slide into here, or /join, or anything related to the pair.

Players:

  2. Luna
